Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 7 -- 8.62 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 7 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy an eight and sixty-two hundredths (8.62) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $434,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of constructing and improving public roads and highways within the District, or for the maintenance thereof, said millage to represent a one and eighteen hundredths mills (1.18) increase (due to reappraisal) over the 7.44 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2019 pursuant to an election held on November 14, 2009?

Race.SpecificTitle: Coulee des Jonc Drainage District -- 16 Mills - BOC - 7 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Coulee des Jonc Drainage District Proposition
(In-Lieu Millage)
Race.FullText: Shall Coulee des Jonc Drainage District of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of sixteen (16) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $448,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of seven (7) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's drainage works, said tax to be in lieu of and replace an ad valorem tax of 11.53 mills authorized to be levied in the District through the year 2026 at an election held in said District on April 9, 2016?

Race.SpecificTitle: Prairie Gregg Drainage District -- 16.35 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Prairie Gregg Drainage District Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Prairie Gregg Drainage District of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a tax of sixteen and thirty-five hundredths (16.35) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $356,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating the District's drainage works, including the purchase and/or repair of equipment therefor, said millage to represent a ninety-nine hundredths of a mill (.99) increase (due to reappraisal) over the 15.36 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2020 pursuant to an election held on October 2, 2010?

Race.SpecificTitle: Coulee Baton Gravity Drainage Dist. No. 1 -- 19.78 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Coulee Baton Gravity Drainage District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Coulee Baton Gravity Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a nineteen and seventy-eight hundredths (19.78) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $87,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for said Gravity Drainage District?
